TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISecureFactory2 implements class Microsoft.IE.ISecureFactory

summary.span: Fornece métodos para a criação de fábricas de classes seguras.

span.span: Provides methods for creating secure class factories.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateInstanceWithSecurity (int dwIdentityFlag, int dwZone, string lpSite, string lpId, string lpLink, string lpLicenses);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateInstanceWithSecurity([in]int32 dwIdentityFlag, [in]int32 dwZone, [in]string lpSite, [in]string lpId, [in]string lpLink, [in]string lpLicenses) runtime managed
Public Function CreateInstanceWithSecurity (dwIdentityFlag As Integer, dwZone As Integer, lpSite As String, lpId As String, lpLink As String, lpLicenses As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ CreateInstanceWithSecurity(int dwIdentityFlag, int dwZone, System::String ^ lpSite, System::String ^ lpId, System::String ^ lpLink, System::String ^ lpLicenses);
abstract member CreateInstanceWithSecurity : int * int * string * string * string * string -> obj

span.span: One of the following CORIESECURITY values:
- CORIESECURITY_ZONE: 0x01
- CORIESECURITY_SITE: 0x02
One of the following URLZONE values:
- URLZONE_LOCAL_MACHINE: 0x00
- URLZONE_INTRANET: 0x01
- URLZONE_TRUSTED: 0x02
- URLZONE_INTERNET: 0x03
- URLZONE_UNTRUSTED: 0x04

param.name: lpSite
param.span: A URL para o site que contém o aplicativo para o qual a fábrica de classes segura será criada.

span.span: The URL for the site that contains the application for which the secure class factory will be created.

param.name: lpId
param.span: A identidade exclusiva para o site.

span.span: The unique identity for the site.

param.name: lpLink
param.span: A parte de link da URL, que pode ser relativa.

span.span: The link portion of the URL, which can be relative.

param.name: lpLicenses
param.span: O local dos arquivos de licença a serem associados ao domínio.

span.span: The location of the license files to associate with the domain.

summary.span: Cria uma nova instância de um tipo COM que representa uma fábrica de classes segura.

span.span: Creates a new instance of a COM type that represents a secure class factory.

returns.span: Um objeto que é um wrapper para a nova instância.

span.span: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance.

returns.span: O valor retornado deve ser desencapsulado para acessar o objeto real.

span.span: The return value must be unwrapped to access the real object.

Public Function CreateInstanceWithSecurity2 (dwFlags As Integer, dwZone As Integer, wszSite As String, wszId As String, wszConfig As String, wszLicenses As String, wszDeploymentManifest As String) As Object

public: System::Object ^ CreateInstanceWithSecurity2(int dwFlags, int dwZone, System::String ^ wszSite, System::String ^ wszId, System::String ^ wszConfig, System::String ^ wszLicenses, System::String ^ wszDeploymentManifest);
abstract member CreateInstanceWithSecurity2 : int * int * string * string * string * string * string -> obj
MemberSignature.Usage: iSecureFactory2.CreateInstanceWithSecurity2 (dwFlags, dwZone, wszSite, wszId, wszConfig, wszLicenses, wszDeploymentManifest)

span.span: One of the following CORIESECURITY values:
- CORIESECURITY_ZONE: 0x01
- CORIESECURITY_SITE: 0x02
One of the following URLZONE values:
- URLZONE_LOCAL_MACHINE: 0x00
- URLZONE_INTRANET: 0x01
- URLZONE_TRUSTED: 0x02
- URLZONE_INTERNET: 0x03
- URLZONE_UNTRUSTED: 0x04

param.name: wszSite
param.span: A URL para o site que contém o aplicativo para o qual a fábrica de classes segura será criada.

span.span: The URL for the site that contains the application for which the secure class factory will be created.

param.name: wszId
param.span: A identidade exclusiva para o site.

span.span: The unique identity for the site.

param.name: wszConfig
param.span: A parte de link da URL, que pode ser relativa.

span.span: The link portion of the URL, which can be relative.

param.name: wszLicenses
param.span: O local dos arquivos de licença a serem associados ao domínio.

span.span: The location of the license files to associate with the domain.

param.name: wszDeploymentManifest
param.span: O local do manifesto de implantação.

span.span: The location of the deployment manifest.

summary.span: Cria uma nova instância de um tipo COM que representa uma fábrica de classes segura usando informações do manifesto de implantação.

span.span: Creates a new instance of a COM type that represents a secure class factory by using information from the deployment manifest.

returns.span: Um objeto que é um wrapper para a nova instância.

span.span: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance.

returns.span: O valor retornado deve ser desencapsulado para acessar o objeto real.

span.span: The return value must be unwrapped to access the real object.
